text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “E jenumanja achinaŵandu! Nam’baga jenumanja n’di ŵakaika pa dini jangu (ja Usilamu), basi (manyililani yanti) nganimba nagalagatile aŵala ŵankwagalagatila ŵangaŵaga Allah, nambo une ngun’galagatila Allah Ajula jwaakumpaga chiwa, soni namulidwe kuti mbe mwa akukulupilila.”
